data.name: Purify
data.title: Cheap Purify
data.pokemon: weedle, rattata, geodude, ducklett, zubat, foongus
data.info: Cheapest, only costing 1,000 stardust and 1 candy to purify.

data.name: Trade Evolve
data.title: Trade Evolve
data.pokemon: haunter, karrablast, machoke, phantump, pumpkaboo, Shelmet, Boldore, Graveler, Gurdurr, Kadabra
data.info: When you trade a Pokemon, its evolution Candy cost is reduced to zero

data.name: Free Evolve
data.title: Evolve for Free
data.pokemon: haunter, karrablast, machoke, phantump, pumpkaboo, Shelmet, Boldore, Graveler, Gurdurr, Kadabra

data.name: 12 Candy
data.title: 12 Candy Evolve
data.pokemon: Caterpie, Weedle, Pidgey, Wurmple, Whismwur, Pidove
data.info: Pokemons that cost only 12 candies to evolve can help in 2X-xp on evolving pokemons and Field Research.

data.name: 400Candy
data.title: 400 Candy Evolve

data.info: Also hide: Favorite, 3-4 star, XL, XXL and Shiny
